TopicTitle: Fuel gage empty when launching or switching to craft

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: windows | CPU: ryzen 7 | GPU: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1660 | RAM: idk

 

Occasionally while launching a new rocket, or switching to a vessel, the fuel bars will be empty and say "0/0t".  This bug stops after throttling the engine at all, and the fuel bar immediately snaps to indicate the correct amount of fuel.
